ref.full: Shekaari, H.; Bezaatpour, A.; Khoshalhan, M. (2012) Thermochim. Acta 527, 67-74.
ref.title: Thermodynamic properties of ionic liquid, 1-hexyl-3-methylimidazolum  bromide, + N-N'bis(2-pyridylmethylidene)-1,2-diiminoethane(BPIE) Schiff  base + N,N- dimethylformamide solutions at T = (298.15 to 313.15) K
